title: Design, synthesis and characterization of tetra substituted 2,3-dihydrothiazole derivatives as DNA and BSA targeting agents: advantages of the visible-light-induced multicomponent approach
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23152-23176
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02331E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ranjana Aggarwal, Naman Jain, Gyan Prakash Dubey
This report describes the visible-light-induced one-pot multicomponent regioselective synthesis of a series of 5-aroyl-3-((arylidene)amino)-2-((arylidene)hydrazono)-4-methyl-2,3-dihydrothiazoles as DNA and BSA targeting agents.
